body.name: West Bend Air Fryer Oven 15-Quart with Digital Controls Easy-View Door and 16 Cooking Presets, Includes Eight Accessories, 1000-Watts, Black
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: SIXTEEN COOKING PRESETS – This 15-quart capacity air fryer oven has one touch time settings for Air fry, Bake, Broil, Chicken, Defrost, Dehydrate, Fish, Fries, Defrost (Frozen), Keep Warm, Pizza, Preheat, Reheat, Roast, Rotisserie, Vegetables
ACCESSORIES – Three air fryer baskets, bake pan, drip tray, rotisserie basket, rotisserie spit, and rotisserie removal handle
AIR FRYER TEMPERATURE CONTROL - Easily set temperature from 85 to 400 degrees Fahrenheit
CONVENIENT FEATURES - Designed with 1000 watts of cooking power, top and bottom heating elements, ergonomic handle, and angled LED digital interface
EASY VIEW – Large easy-view glass door to monitor cooking progress
body.description: Discover a quick and easy way to cook healthy, delicious food with the West Bend Air Fryer. With a spacious 15-quart capacity, you and your family can enjoy the crispy taste you love without deep frying your food in oil. Take the guesswork out of preparing your favorite foods to crispy perfection with 16 preset functions (Air Fry, Bake, Broil, Chicken, Defrost, Dehydrate, Fish, Fries, Defrost (Frozen), Keep Warm, Pizza, Preheat, Reheat, Roast, Rotisserie, Vegetables​). The angled LED digital interface is easy to read and access while you're cooking. A convenient easy-view glass door lets you monitor your food as it is perfectly prepared​. The easy-to-grip, ergonomic handle​ is cool to the touch, making it safe to grab while cooking. This black air fryer fits on your countertop, and the sleek look with stainless-steel accents complements any kitchen décor. Cook various foods with the eight included air fryer accessories: three air fryer baskets, a bake pan, a drip tray, a rotisserie basket, a rotisserie spit and a rotisserie removal handle. Covered by the West Bend 12-Month Limited Warranty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Excellent saves Time and Cooks very well
reviews.reviewText: Me and my girl have 3 kids we had 2 days with it and hooked like crack we already used it 3 or 4 times it's very convenient and it warms fast everything is done in half the time chicken in 20 minutes pork chops too and all kinda food gets done in no time. Very highly recommended to a family I can cook assorted meals on one session. I can cook chicken and pork chops and even a pizza 🍕 it's the size for me im fine with a conventional cooker it does meals in half the time ⏲️ very fast I love the clean up it's fast with the drip tray and the racks just have to be soaked in water 💧a few minutes and can be reused in mins and also convenient it's easy to wipe clean and everything is fast. 💯💯💯 15 Quarts is a nice size for 95 can't beat it....Easy to use one button I don't need it to be I give it 10 out of 10 🍗🍗🍗🍗

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The air fryer was a Christmas gift. The recipient is very happy with the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Has a learning curve
reviews.reviewText: This has taken a bit of experimentation to get used to it, but the more I use it the more I like it. For taking up not much counter space, it sure can take a large amount of food. I was looking at this oven style over the basket style fryers and I'm impressed with the versatility of this unit. There's so many setting that I'd be hard pressed to use them all. The controls felt a bit cumbersome at first but i gradually got used to the dial and press manner of operation. Saves time and energy over using a regular oven so i'm finding this becoming my go to appliance,I would have given this five stars except for a couple of things that aren't so great. First off, the popcorn basket is just plain dumb and takes up cupboard space; it's not something I would use (so out it went). The biggest disappointment was with the manual. The instructions are very vague and cook times unclear with no real recipes included. I started off making french fries and chicken nuggets (which cook really well) and moved on from there. You'll probably want to get an air fryer oven cookbook which is what I did.So it did take some learning but ultimately, I'm very pleased and so glad I went with this style of cooker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m quite happy with this air fryer. It’s easy to use an easy to clean and so very convenient. I rarely use my stove oven even my grandson uses it.

reviews.reviewText: This air fryer is totally worth the money!! We use it for everything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unbelievable Product! I love ❤️ it so much! I may file for a Divorce!
reviews.reviewText: I grant you that it takes a little to learn how to operate! But once you have it down you will be amazed 👏 my best purchase in 2023!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Needs more info in the user manual
reviews.reviewText: Overall this is a great little air fryer, however the instruction/user manual is very minimum. It says you can pop popcorn but doesn't explain how to attach the popcorn container to the oven. We did figure it out but it really takes exact finagling to make the thing fit in properly. Once you do, it does indeed pop popcorn wonderfully. I like the multi level function so you can air fry two items at once (like tater tots and chicken nuggets). My only complaint about that is that the shelves don't have a lip to it so if you move it too fast the items slide right off. Also, there's not a great way to grab the trays... It is a versatile contraption and we will get good use out of it, but it definitely could use a few minor improvements in these areas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not as fast as other Air Fryer
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to replace a small air fryer I own. This looks similar. However, it does not function as well as the other one that I have owned for a couple of years now. This review is a comparison.-It is slower, a meal that usually take 7 minutes to cook took 12 minutes-It cooks better than the other air fryer, meaning the flavor is so much better-It is not touchscreen and figuring out how to use the dial button to set up type, timing, and temperature was a little bit cumbersome.-It has only three buttons, the dial to set temp, time, and type, a pause and go, finally a on and off button-Although it does not take much counter space, it can take a lot of food.-I have tried the rotisserie and it takes long as well, but cook the item to perfection-It comes with its own drip tray, rotisserie hook and cage, and three grillsOverall, it is not too too bad. I preferred my other one because it is touchscreens and cooks everything fast. This one albeit way slower, convection oven slower, cooks the food way better.I do like it and think it’s a good air fryer system
